tasks.name: plan
tasks.title: Plan the next task
what to do: Make sure to fully read the PLAN.md file
Check current project requirements at the top of PLAN.md to ensure compliance.
Review task dependencies and identify any blocking/waiting tasks in the dependency chain.
Include the following sections in your response:
# Plan Next Task
## Task Analysis
## Proposed Solution
## Implementation Steps
## Potential Challenges
## Testing and Validation
## Conclusion

tasks.name: execute
tasks.title: Execute the planned task
what to do: Make sure to fully read the PLAN.md file
Follow the detailed plan created in the 'Plan the next task' step.
Implement the solution according to the outlined steps.
Validate that changes work correctly (test functionality, verify integrations).
Update relevant documentation (README.md, ARCHITECTURE.md as needed).
Update PLAN.md status when task milestones are completed.
Ensure to document any deviations from the plan and reasons for those changes.

tasks.name: review
tasks.title: Review previous work
what to do: Make sure to fully read the PLAN.md file
Carefully review the last completed task to ensure it meets all specified requirements.
Check for accuracy, completeness, and adherence to guidelines outlined in the PLAN.md file.
Verify that all project requirements (listed at top of PLAN.md) are still being met.
Confirm that documentation updates were made (ARCHITECTURE.md, README.md, PLAN.md).
Provide constructive feedback and suggest improvements if necessary.

tasks.name: update
tasks.title: Update project plan and status
what to do: Make sure to fully read the PLAN.md file
Update PLAN.md with completed tasks and current status.
Mark dependencies as unblocked where appropriate.
Update ARCHITECTURE.md if structural changes were made.
Ensure all project requirements are still being met.
Update the 'Current Status' section to reflect the new state.
Check if any waiting tasks can now move to in-progress.
